    MessageEmbedUpdate
    When a message's embeds are updated, Discord sends a MESSAGE_UPDATE event that only has id/channel_id/guild_id/embeds in the inner payload.
    MessageReference  
    ReactionUpdate
    Fired when a reaction is updated.
